p: The plant also contains numerous flavonoids, including: quercetin, kaempferol, apigenin, artemethin, and rutoside [ 1, 16, 21, 22, 34, 35], and numerous phenolic acids such as: chlorogenic, ferulic, gallic, caffeic, syringic, and vanillic, and derivatives of caffeoylquinic acid [ 16, 21, 36, 37].
